
{{alias}}( a, b )
    Constructs a Givens rotation from two single-precision 
    floating-point numbers.

    Parameters
    ----------
    a: float
        Rotational elimination parameter.
    
    b: float
        Rotational elimination parameter.

    Returns
    -------
    out: Float32Array
        Computed values.

    Examples
    --------
    // Standard usage:
    > var out = {{alias}}( 0.0, 2.0 )
    <Float32Array>[ 2.0, 1.0, 0.0, 1.0 ]

    See Also
    --------
